creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: standing figure wearing a purple kimono with tan trim and large light blue characters, with a black dragon-patterned larger kimono over his shoulders; PR hand resting on handle of sword with green wrapped handle and gold and red sheath; line of origami frogs from stack of papers in LRC to PR sleeve; dark blue ground with moon and two flying cranes in ULC; text within cartouches in URC and along right edge in LRQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Toyokuni's Drawings: A Magic Contest (Toyokuni kigō: Kijutsu kurabe 豊国揮毫　奇術競)
title: The actor Kawarazaki Gonjūrō I (Ichikawa Danjūrō IX) in the role of Jiraiya
